snippet.title: Kowloon's Curse Trailer
snippet.description:
From Studio [notes.] comes Kowloon’s Curse. 

You have been brought to “Kowloon City”, a virtual recreation of Kowloon Walled City by a man only known as Mr. Kowloon. Explore the cursed city, find out why you were brought here, and open your door to escape Kowloon City. 

Download the Kowloon's Curse Demo:
PC: https://triumph-corporation.itch.io/kowloons-cuhttpsitchiogamesummary897994rse-demo
Android: 
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TriumphCorporation.KowloonsCurseDemo&hl=nl

Follow Kowloon's Curse on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Triumph_Corp
Follow [notes.] on Twitter: 
https://twitter.com/studio_nts
Support [notes.] on Ko-fi:
https://ko-fi.com/notes
